tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (PDT Such) (DT a) (JJ boring) (NN day)) (, ,) (ADVP (RB now)) (NP (PRP I))) (VP (VBP have) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB wait) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT the) (JJ cold) (NN :-LRB-)))))))))
